mainHero.title: Design better ideas with
mainHero.subtitle: Iterator
mainHero.description: We all have good ideas, don't we? But how do we make sure that they are good enough to be presented to investors? Iterator is a platform that helps you design better ideas, by providing you with the tools to host, score, develop and share your ideas.

secondaryAction.href: mailto:info@iterator.ch?subject=I want to know more about Iterator!

items.title: Hosting
items.description: Keep all your ideas in the same place. Host your ideas on our secured servers.

items.title: Scoring
items.description: Evaluate the quality of your ideas along several dimensions such as originality, feasibility, impact, and compare it to others.

items.title: Developing
items.description: Use our cutting-edge AI tools to iterate around your ideas until they are mature enough to be presented to investors.

items.title: Sharing
items.description: Connect with other innovators, contribute to their ideas, and share yours with the rest of the world,

features.title: Incredible features
features.subtitle: Your ideas deserve the best tools
features.description: Discover our home-made and patended innovations to help you make the most out of your ideas.

items.name: Ideas matching
items.description: Our ideas matching algorithm automatically scores the similarity between ideas, giving you the opportunity to create matches with other like-minded innovators.

items.name: Git-like contributions
items.description: When a match is created, you have the opportunity to contribute to otherâ€™s ideas, in a Git-like manner.

items.name: AI-powered idea prototyping
items.description: Our AI powered tools give you superpowers to bring your ideas to the next level.

items.name: Data-driven assesment
items.description: Our data-driven assesment tools allow you to evaluate the quality of your ideas along several dimensions.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
